lines.text: Eddie?
You know me, but I don't know you. Why is that?
Don't you know anything?
I'm gonna give you a piece of my mind. I trusted you, Karen.
[He proceeds to pull a piece of brain out of a bullet hole in his head]

[points his rifle]
I've got silver bullets in here.
Silver bullets my ass! Get up, T.C.!
We should have stuck with the old ways. Raising cattle for our feed. Where's the life in that?
Humans *are* our cattle.
Humans are our *prey*. We should feed on them, like we've always done. Screw all this "channel your energies" crap.
[first lines]

Repression. Repression is the father of neurosis, of self-hatred. Now, stress results when we fight against our impulses. We've all heard people talk about animal magnetism, the natural man. the noble savage, as if we'd lost something valuable in our long evolution into civilized human beings. Now there's a good reason for this.
A secret society exists, and is living among all of us. They are neither people nor animals, but something in-between.

[knocking on mortuary-vault door]
Visitors, Eddie!

[on how to kill werewolves]
Silver bullets or fire, that's the only way to get rid of the damn things. They're worse than cock-a-roaches.
You can't tame what's meant to be wild, doc. It just ain't natural.
I'm looking for my wife.
Why?

[upon being shot]
Thank God!
[Drops to the ground]
There was howling just a minute ago.
It was probably somebody's stray dog.
It didn't sound like any dog I've ever heard before.
Honey, you're from Los Angeles. The wildest thing you've ever heard is Wolfman Jack. This is the country.
[looking in what was Eddie Quist's morgue locker]
He's not here!
He was here this morning!

[noticing the damage on the inside of the locker door]
Look at the door!
You think somebody took him?
Well, he didn't just get up and walk away!
You're crazy!
Oh, I'm much more than that!

[to Chris]
Hello, bright boy.
sun-worshippers, moon-worshippers, Satanists. The Manson family used to hang around and shoplift. Bunch of deadbeats!
00 report.
[last lines]
Hey Ernie? Put that pepper steak on for me, will ya? And a hamburger for the lady.
How do ya want that?
How you want it, honey?

[smiles]
Rare.
Where's Bill?
He's one of us now.
We have to warn people, Chris. We have to make them believe.
Sorry to scare you, ma'am, thought you was a cowjacker.

Haven't you ever done Assertiveness Training? Before I looked into the Doc, I did it all - EST, T.M., Scientology, iridology, Primal Scream... I don't know, I figure another five years of real hard work, and maybe I'll be a real human being.

[addressing Dr. Waggner]
"We can fit in," you said. "We can live with them." You make me sick.
Wow!
What are you kids watching?
The newslady's turned into a werewolf!
You believe in this?
Silver bullets. Some joker ordered them. Thirty-ought-six
[caliber]
. Never picked 'em up. I take Bank AmeriCard, American Express, Visa. You gonna buy that or what?
We should never try to deny the beast - the animal within us.

[about Marsha]
She walked past you like a bitch in heat!
